## Description

[MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/) is a NoSQL database program that uses JSON-like documents with optional schemas.
This component allows you to create, read, update, and delete documents inside a MongoDB collection.

## Connections

### Mongo Connection

Create a new MongoDB connection and enter [the connection string for your MongoDB server](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/connection-string/).

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      placeholder: "Collection",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments: "The name of your collection.",
      example: "customers",
      key: "collection",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Collection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments:
        'The connection string to use for connecting to a Mongo cluster. From the "Database Deployments" screen, click "Connect" next to a cluster to view the connection string. Refer to https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/connection-string/ for details on format and configuration options.',
      example:
        "mongodb+srv://<user>:<password>@cluster0.example.mongodb.net/?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=Cluster0",
      key: "connectionString",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Cluster Connection String",
    },
    {
      placeholder: "Database",
      required: true,
      shown: true,
      comments: "The name of your database.",
      example: "admin",
      key: "database",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Database",
    },
  ]}
/>

## Actions

<div id="convertobjectid" />

### Convert Object ID

The Object ID is a unique identifier for a document in a MongoDB collection. This action takes either a string ID or Object ID object, and returns both the ObjectID '\_id' and stringified ID versions of the ID which can be used in subsequent actions. | <small><b>key: convertObjectId</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "The ID to convert to an Object ID.",
      example: "5a9427648b0beebeb69579e7",
      key: "objectId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Object ID",
    },
  ]}
/>

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="deletemany" />

### Delete Many

Remove documents from a collection that match a query. | <small><b>key: deleteMany</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        'Filters are used to narrow down the results of a query, or to determine which documents to update or delete. For example, you can search for documents whose key "firstName" is "John". To search by ID, provide a key of "_id". Use the "Comparison Operator" input to specify the type of comparison to perform if needed.',
      key: "document",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Query Fields",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "mongoConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "acknowledged": true,
    "deletedCount": 1
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="findall" />

### Find All

Retrieve all documents in a collection that match a query. | <small><b>key: findAll</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: false,
      model: [
        {
          value: "$eq",
          label: "Equal",
        },
        {
          value: "$gt",
          label: "Greater Than",
        },
        {
          value: "$gte",
          label: "Greater Than or Equal",
        },
        {
          value: "$lt",
          label: "Less Than",
        },
        {
          value: "$lte",
          label: "Less Than or Equal",
        },
        {
          value: "$ne",
          label: "Not Equal",
        },
      ],
      comments:
        'The comparison operator to use when filtering documents. Use this field in conjunction with the "Query Fields" input.',
      key: "comparisonOperator",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Comparison Operator",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        'If true, number values detected in the "Query Fields" input will be converted to numeric types.',
      key: "convertValuesToNumbers",
      type: "boolean",
      default: "false",
      label: "Convert Values to Numbers",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "The maximum number of documents to return.",
      key: "limit",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Limit",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "mongoConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        'Filters are used to narrow down the results of a query, or to determine which documents to update or delete. For example, you can search for documents whose key "firstName" is "John". To search by ID, provide a key of "_id". Use the "Comparison Operator" input to specify the type of comparison to perform if needed.',
      key: "queryFilter",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Query Fields",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments: "The number of documents to skip when paginating.",
      key: "skip",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Skip",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": [
    {
      "_id": "610ae111774d8aaef3b5d2eb",
      "id": "610ae111774d8aaef3b5d2eb",
      "exampleKey": "exampleValue"
    }
  ]
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="findone" />

### Find One

Retrieve one document in a collection that match a query. If no document is found, an error is thrown. | <small><b>key: findOne</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: false,
      model: [
        {
          value: "$eq",
          label: "Equal",
        },
        {
          value: "$gt",
          label: "Greater Than",
        },
        {
          value: "$gte",
          label: "Greater Than or Equal",
        },
        {
          value: "$lt",
          label: "Less Than",
        },
        {
          value: "$lte",
          label: "Less Than or Equal",
        },
        {
          value: "$ne",
          label: "Not Equal",
        },
      ],
      comments:
        'The comparison operator to use when filtering documents. Use this field in conjunction with the "Query Fields" input.',
      key: "comparisonOperator",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Comparison Operator",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        'If true, number values detected in the "Query Fields" input will be converted to numeric types.',
      key: "convertValuesToNumbers",
      type: "boolean",
      default: "false",
      label: "Convert Values to Numbers",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "mongoConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        'Filters are used to narrow down the results of a query, or to determine which documents to update or delete. For example, you can search for documents whose key "firstName" is "John". To search by ID, provide a key of "_id". Use the "Comparison Operator" input to specify the type of comparison to perform if needed.',
      key: "queryFilter",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Query Fields",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "_id": "610ae111774d8aaef3b5d2eb",
    "id": "610ae111774d8aaef3b5d2eb",
    "exampleKey": "exampleValue"
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="insertmany" />

### Insert Many

Insert new documents into a collection | <small><b>key: insertMany</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      comments:
        "For each item, provide a document ( Javascript Object ) to be inserted into the collection.",
      required: true,
      key: "documentList",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      collection: "valuelist",
      label: "Documents",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "mongoConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "acknowledged": true,
    "insertedCount": 3,
    "insertedIds": {}
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="insertone" />

### Insert One

Insert a new document into a collection | <small><b>key: insertOne</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      comments:
        "Provide key and value pairs that make up the properties of your document.",
      required: true,
      key: "document",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Document Fields",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "mongoConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "acknowledged": true,
    "insertedId": "610ae111774d8aaef3b5d2eb"
  }
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="updateone" />

### Update One

Update a single document in a collection | <small><b>key: updateOne</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        'Filters are used to narrow down the results of a query, or to determine which documents to update or delete. For example, you can search for documents whose key "firstName" is "John". To search by ID, provide a key of "_id". Use the "Comparison Operator" input to specify the type of comparison to perform if needed.',
      key: "document",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Query Fields",
    },
    {
      comments:
        "Provide key and value pairs to be inserted/updated in your document.",
      required: false,
      key: "documentUpdate",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Update Fields",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "mongoConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      comments:
        "If true, creates a new document when no document matches the query criteria.",
      key: "upsert",
      type: "boolean",
      default: "false",
      label: "Upsert",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "acknowledged": true,
    "modifiedCount": 1,
    "upsertedId": null,
    "upsertedCount": 0,
    "matchedCount": 1
  }
}
```
